Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Prohibits cable television companies from collecting payment when an unsolicited reduction to service occurs
Summary: Prohibits cable television companies from collecting payment when an unsolicited reduction to service occurs; provides no request for future payment shall be made.
LawCode: Amd ยง224-b, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to prohibiting cable television companies from collecting payment when an unsolicited reduction to service occurs
